name: JUMP ON!
description:
JUMP ON! Fun Alien Shooter

This game is made by Inverted Z and published by FrizzyHair.

You can never complete this game because it is a super fun alien shooter.

You are Potato Man, A secret agent who is assigned to eliminate all the aliens

in the city of London, but these aliens are never ending, can you survive?

Controls -

W,A,S,D to move

Left Mouse click to shoot

Right mouse click to shoot special

Bonuses-

Bomb

Health

Ways to Die-

By Aliens

Jump in the river

So just kill the aliens and beat yourself

Scores-

100 for every kill

Penalty-

None

Alien Variety-

Green creeper

UFO

Thanks!!

Comment any bugs below

(c)Unity
